Notes on Top Language Schools:

- Qalam wa Lawh: offers fully customizable programs in both Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) and Colloquial Modern Arabic (Darija)
- International House Madrid: offers both face-to-face and online Spanish courses, as well as accommodation options, programmes for groups, and university pathway courses
- Berlitz: offers language courses in English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Russian, Mandarin, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, American Sign Language (ASL), and other languages. They offer courses for adults, kids and teens, online and in-person courses, private and group lessons, as well as corporate language training, language testing, and culture training.
